title: Commit to making an effective RSV vaccine - UGA Research News
author: Jennbryant
description: Everyone is infected by respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) by age 2. For infants, contracting RSV can be fatal. UGA's Ralph Tripp is working on a vaccine to keep babies safe and healthy.
sitename: University of Georgia Office of Research
cleaned_text: Everyone is infected by respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) by age 2. For infants, contracting RSV can be fatal. UGA's Ralph Tripp is working on a vaccine to keep babies safe and healthy.
